anyone who gets a black screen when starting game do as the following:
1. go to Red Alert 2 folder 
2. right click on the file RA2MD and select propeties
3. go to Compatibility
4. check the first box from the top
5. press OK
now u can run it from start>programs>westwood>Yuri's Revenge>Yuri's Revenge

hope that helps :D

finally I got it to work!!!
All those who get an error message when trying to play Yuri's Revenge,
Follow these step:
> Install Red Alert 2: Allied
> Update Red Alert 2 to version 1.006
> ***Do NOT use the cracks or Copy Protection
   Remover as yet
> Install Yuri's Revenge
> Update Yuri's Revenge to version 1.001
> Keep Yuri's Revenge disc mounted in the
   virtual drive as there seems to be no NO-CD
   crack for Yuri's Revenge
> Play Yuri's Revenge
.
NOW... to play the normal Red Alert 2 but not
Yuri's revenge:
> Copy .mix files from the Allied and Soviet disc
> Apply the NO-CD Crack ONLY for Red Alert 2
   v1.006, & not for Yuri's Revenge
> Use the Copy Protection Removal Tool
> Play Red Alert 2 w/out the expansion

Hello Everybody... i think i have downloaded this some time in the past so thank you

anyways  If you guys would like to play online. Download this install game and Internet Components Anyways having done that. Try connecting to the internet once. you will be asked to download somthing. Accept it. Once you're finished. Exit the game and press the win key + R, you will be shown the run prompt. Type this \WINDOWS\system32\drivers\etc\hosts and start it.
you will then be asked how you want it to be open, select notepad. Or any other text editor, and in put these lines at the bottom..

195.189.238.82 servserv.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 irc.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 gameres.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 apiregister.westwood.com

Your file should look like this

# Copyright (c) 1993-1999 Microsoft Corp.
#
# This is a sample HOSTS file used by Microsoft TCP/IP for Windows.
#
# This file contains the mappings of IP addresses to host names. Each
# entry should be kept on an individual line. The IP address should
# be placed in the first column followed by the corresponding host name.
# The IP address and the host name should be separated by at least one
# space.
#
# Additionally, comments (such as these) may be inserted on individual
# lines or following the machine name denoted by a '#' symbol.
#
# For example:
#
# 102.54.94.97 rhino.acme.com # source server
# 38.25.63.10 x.acme.com # x client host

127.0.0.1 localhost
195.189.238.82 servserv.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 irc.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 gameres.westwood.com
195.189.238.82 apiregister.westwood.com

Save the file and start RA2
click internet, login.

Login with a unique personal name.
your password must be 8 characters

and you are set
